title: Exploring Human Nature Through Literature Education: Advanced Workshop for Elementary School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Core literature education methodologies and elementary curriculum management experience
context.additional_context: A course where elementary school teachers share insights into human nature through literary works and develop classroom-applicable educational strategies

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to interpret human nature through multilayered analysis of diverse literary texts.
Design a process for shared meaning-making among learners using experimental inquiry dialogue techniques.
Connect personal educational practice experiences with literary works to write reflective journals.
Apply principles for designing literature-based activities to understand social relationships.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
